amendatorysection.catchline: City council; members; bond or insurance.
amendatorysection.para: All members of the city council of a city of the metropolitan class shall qualify and give bond or evidence of equivalent insurance in the sum of five thousand dollars.

annotation.para: This section does not apply to "holdover officers", as they are governed by section 11-117. State ex rel. Shaw v. Rosewater, 79 Neb. 450, 113 N.W. 206 (1907).
